titles.title: A bill to authorize the use of drugs, vaccines, and medical technologies to expand military and civilian access to such products and to improve transparency in taxpayer-funded biomedical research investments by the Department of Defense, and for other purposes.
Make Taxpayer-Funded Department of Defense Medical Interventions Affordable Act
Make Taxpayer-Funded Department of Defense Medical Interventions Affordable Act

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Armed Services.

bill.summary:
Make Taxpayer-Funded Department of Defense Medical Interventions Affordable Act
This bill requires the Department of Defense (DOD) to report on its efforts to comply with provisions of a report related to the licensing of federally owned medical interventions. DOD must also compile into a searchable database information relating to federal support provided by DOD for biomedical research and development.
